channel.title: fennec on Joone Blog
channel.description: Recent content in fennec on Joone Blog

item.title: Debugging Fennec front-end
item.description: Fennec is a XUL application, like Firefox based on Mozilla Platform.

item.title: Fixing a hardware keyboard problem in Mobile Firefox for Windows Mobile
item.description: Finally, my patch was applied to the mainline of Mozilla and this cumbersome bug has been fixed.

item.title: How to make a cab installer of Windows Mobile Fennec build
item.description: When you finish building Fennec for Windows Mobile, you can ask “How can I install Fennec on my Windows Mobile handset?

item.title: Fennec is running on SAMSUNG i780
item.description: I was told a very good news from Blassey blog.

item.title: Hildon related bugzilla issues
item.description: <img src="http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3348/3188016234_a551140d92.jpg" alt="Fennec1.0 alpha3 preview"> 426291 Add support for Hildon (Maemo) application menu 426292 Add support for Hildon (Maemo) filepicker 426293 Add support for Hildon (Maemo) banner for alerts 426299 Create a theme for Hildon (Maemo) platform Fennec has some bugs in Hildon integration as you can see the above list, but the Fennec team has not cared about theses bugs, because they seems to focus on implementing the UI features and Windows Mobile port for XULRunner.

item.title: Firefox for Mobile Devices
item.description: I’d like to share a little bit old presentation about Mobile Firefox.

item.title: Latest looks of Fennec (Mobile Firefox)
item.description: The plan of Mobile Firefox was announced in October last

item.title: My N810 was delivered from the US.
item.description: I bought a Nokia N810 from Amazon. Actually, there are not any shopping malls selling N810 in Korea so I had to buy an N810 from the oversea shopping mall.
